description.value: Action Cost: [Reaction] Trigger: An attack would hit you (after opposed roll but before damage) Range: Self (can teleport up to 30 feet) Effect: Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. The attack automatically misses as you vanish in a shimmer of violet light and reappear elsewhere. You cannot teleport through solid barriers. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
